flow of the game so you need to sort of watch what you're doing there the API is not thread safe so you want

so they've got no graphics they've got no interactivity no actions no nothing
so they are containers and by default they're basically empty everything in
your game is a game object and this includes things like characters vehicles scenery lights all these kinds of things
